item.title: By: Andrew Armstrong

item.description: Hi. Just letting you know that I enjoyed your site.
item.content:encoded: Hi. Just letting you know that I enjoyed your site.

item.title: By: Dominik Gabler
item.dc:creator: Dominik Gabler
item.description: Pugs for anything above UBRS are suicide... i did Zul gurub once with a pug (because my 2 guild groups were well stocked on healers/mages :/ ) and it was a horror... 3 priests and only myself (a druid) felt responsible for healing tanks...
item.content:encoded:
Pugs for anything above UBRS are suicide…
i did Zul gurub once with a pug (because my 2 guild groups were well stocked on healers/mages :/ ) and it was a horror… 3 priests and only myself (a druid) felt responsible for healing tanks…

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: god i would kill myself if i had to use a pick up group for a 40 man run... thank god for being a big raiding guild. no pugs for me kthxbye
item.content:encoded: god i would kill myself if i had to use a pick up group for a 40 man run… thank god for being a big raiding guild. no pugs for me kthxbye

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Oh. One of those. Ya, we have a few of those pallies in our raids, too.
There is no worse fate than BEING ASSIGNED TO GROUP 8. That's right, they can babysit all the hunters and a rogue or two. They don't like buffing? See how they like patch healing.
As soon as the hunters express satisfaction with the paladin assigned to them, we promote him/her to group 7 and assign an even shittier paladin to group 8.
Hey, no one said that being a hunter was going to be easy.
If it's a pickup group tho, meh, what can ya do.
item.content:encoded:
Oh. One of those. Ya, we have a few of those pallies in our raids, too.

There is no worse fate than BEING ASSIGNED TO GROUP 8. That’s right, they can babysit all the hunters and a rogue or two. They don’t like buffing? See how they like patch healing.

As soon as the hunters express satisfaction with the paladin assigned to them, we promote him/her to group 7 and assign an even shittier paladin to group 8.

Hey, no one said that being a hunter was going to be easy.

If it’s a pickup group tho, meh, what can ya do.

item.title: By: Melchoir
item.dc:creator: Melchoir
item.description: Thats actually one of the funnest things i've read. But is there anything u can do to Paladin who wont cast blessings on u?
item.content:encoded: Thats actually one of the funnest things i’ve read. But is there anything u can do to Paladin who wont cast blessings on u?
